#summary HighFaces overview page

= Introduction =

HighFaces is a JSF 2 component library wrapping the famous JS library highcharts and providing easiest possible and stable access to its API from JSF.



= Details =

To see HighFaces in Action, visit the showcase application at http://www.highfaces.org

= Maven Usage =

To use highfaces in your project, simply add the following dependency:

{{{
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.highfaces</groupId>
    <artifactId>highfaces</artifactId>
    <version>1.0</version>
</dependency>
}}}
